Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
   Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- A wreath from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, was laid by Zhou Haiqiao, general manager of the Putong Zhiyuan Trading Co., Ltd. in Beijing of China, on a visit to the DPRK before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Friday on the occasion of her 89th birth anniversary.
 Written on the ribbon of the wreath were letters "On the occasion of the 89th birth anniversary of General Kim Jong Suk".

articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Mongolian Delegation
   Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with a delegation of the State Great Hural of Mongolia led by R. Badamdamdin, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 Present there were Kim Wan Su, chairman of the Korea-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group, officials concerned and Janchivdorjyn Lomvo, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the State Great Hural of Mongolia.
 The gift was conveyed to Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by R. Badamdamdin, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory message by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
 The floral basket and the message were handed to Minister of the People's Armed Forces Kim Il Chol on Friday by Yang Xilian, military attache of the Chinese embassy here who is doyen of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned Friday by Zhou Haiqiao, general manager of the Putong Zhiyuan Trading Co., Ltd. in Beijing of China, on a visit to the DPRK.
